img_above_text:
![Wukong Bitter 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/20/Wukong_Bitter_8.jpg)
Sometimes, he'll take to the air instead, and fly at you in a divebomb attack which will require you to dodge both the fly-by, and the resulting row of lightning strikes that follow his attack.
img_below_text:
Another electric variation will have him performing an underhanded toss of anywhere between one and three small lightning orbs. They'll bounce along the water for a few hops, and then explode in a much wider area to damage you unless you can dodge to the side.
![Wukong Bitter 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4b/Wukong_Bitter_13.jpg)

Sometimes, he'll take to the air instead, and fly at you in a divebomb attack which will require you to dodge both the fly-by, and the resulting row of lightning strikes that follow his attack."
        - Following Text: "Another electric variation will have him performing an underhanded toss of anywhere between one and three small lightning orbs. They'll bounce along the water for a few hops, and then explode in a much wider area to damage you unless you can dodge to the side.
![Wukong Bitter 13.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/4b/Wukong_Bitter_13.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a boss fight in *Black Myth: Wukong* against "Chen Loong," a serpentine creature emitting a burst of electricity. The player character, wielding a staff, is shown dodging or preparing to counter the lightning-based attack. The snowy, water-filled environment highlights the boss's use of lightning and water mechanics, aligning with the preceding and following text that describes the boss's aerial divebomb and lightning orb attacks.
